text: Elathur Railway Station is a major railway station serving the city of Kozhikode in the Kozhikode District of Kerala. It lies in the Shoranur - Mangalore Section of the Southern Railways. Trains halting at the station connect the town to prominent cities in India such as Thiruvananthapuram, Kochi, Chennai, Kollam, Bangalore, Kozhikode, Coimbatore, Mangalore, Mysore and so forth. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kozhikode district Category:Palakkad railway division
title: Elathur railway station
